Hear the Difference

**** This is a non-refundable, custom order item. Ships directly from the manufacturer in 6-8 weeks.****
Drivers come in all shapes, sizes and styles. Shouldn't a headrest adjust so that all Mustang enthusiasts can drive in comfort and style? Team MRT thought so! This headrest fits 2005 - 2009 Mustangs and allows drivers to select from four distinct rest positions. You'll enjoy your Mustang without a sore neck and without settling for a bizarre or unfinished look in your interior.

Our headrests are sold as a pair. The set includes one driver and one passenger headrest.

The headrest you see pictured above is Charcoal Black.

Products.ProductName: 2010 - 2012 Mustang MRT Predator Interior Package
Products.ProductDescription:
Give your vehicle interior a premium performance look with the MRT Predator Interior Package for 2010 - 2014 Ford Mustang. Offering unique style and quality craftsmanship, the Predator Interior upgrade includes custom seat covers, door panel inserts and console lid cover. Matching adjustable headrests are available as an option. Upholstery black, rough grain leather with black diamond stitch pattern accents. This product is made in the USA.

The predator interior kit includes:
(2) optional adjustable headrests with four tilt positions
(4) seat covers
(1) console lid cover
(2) door panel inserts

Note: Interior kit does NOT come with pony stitching seen in photos.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2014 Mustang MRT Aluminum Rear Window Louvers
Products.ProductDescription:
The MRT team engineered the 2005 - 2014 Mustang Rear Window Louver to offer OE-caliber fit and finish. The rounded louver slats are free of rivets and protruding hardware. In addition, the curvature of the louver closely follows the Mustang's rear window glass. The MRT Mustang Rear Window Louver has a patented one piece, aircraft-grade aluminum design that ensures the louver is both lightweight and durable. With its high-quality, satin black powder-coat finish, it's ready to install right out of the box!

During installation, the Rear Window Louver by MRT requires no sheet metal drilling or other modifications to your Mustang. A Louver Hardware Kit is included and will provide you with the instructions and materials you need. Also included with the MRT Rear Window Louver is a Louver Prop Rod Kit. The kit allows you to prop up the louver on its hinges--making cleaning the rear window a quick, painless, one person job.

MRT Rear Window Louvers are made and engineered in America. They fit 2005 - 2014 Ford Mustangs, and are also available in a variety of custom painted finishes. Please contact us at 734-455-5807 for more information on custom painted Rear Window Louvers.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Team MRT engineered the new Camaro louver to be functional and durable, while maintaining a sleek design that you and your Camaro will love. The MRT Rear Window Louver completes the natural lines of the 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro without compromising the Camaro's rear window visibility. The curvature of each louver is designed to produce a tight, flowing look and an arc that complements the Camaro's rear window. In addition, each Camaro louver features a smooth, seamless surface, free of distracting rivets and protruding hardware. The MRT Rear Window Louver for the 2010-2015 Camaro is sure to give your Camaro a legendary bad-boy look.

The MRT Rear Window Louver comes powder-coated satin black and ready to install. The Camaro louver may be painted to your taste, but the powder-coated black finish will look presentable on your 2010-2015 Camaro as-is. The MRT Camaro louver a one piece all-aluminum design that is lightweight and durable. It is hinged to allow you to easily lift the Camaro louver for cleaning. The included MRT Prop Rod Kit makes handling the Camaro louver a one-person job. The MRT Camaro Rear Window Louver requires no sheet metal drilling or modifications to your Camaro during installation of the louver. A Camaro Louver Hardware Kit is included, and we will provide you with the louver instructions and materials you need. MRT Camaro louvers are made and engineered in America.

These Louvers are also available in a variety of custom painted finishes. Please contact us at 734-455-5807 for more information on custom painted Rear Window Louvers.

The Rear Window Louver for the 1994-04 Mustang is simply the best louver on the market. The curvature of the louver closely follows the Mustang's rear window glass accentuating the sleek styling of the body panels. It features a one piece, aircraft-grade aluminum construction, making the louver lightweight and durable. The unique hinge design allows the louver to be raised up on it's prop rods making cleaning the back glass simple and painless.

With the high quality, satin black powder-coat finish, MRT Rear Window Louvers are ready to install right out of the box! No sheet metal drilling or other modifications to your Mustang are required for installation.

The perfect fit! The stylish MRT Rear Window Louver completes the natural lines of the 1994-04 Ford Mustang for a timeless muscle car look.

Products.ProductName: 2010 - 2012 Mustang GT, Boss 302 MRT Front Splitter
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT Front Splitter: Track-inspired function and style. Featuring tough ABS plastic construction, MRT made this piece to last. It's grained to create a rugged appearance that's packed with attitude. Pure Stainless Steel turnbuckles resist rust and secure the Splitter to your Mustang's front fascia for an authentic finish. The MRT Front Splitter requires no paint. We kept precise fit and stunning impact in mind as we engineered the Front Splitter. We wanted our product to be "smart," so that it's as convenient as possible for you to install on your Mustang. Here's what we came up with:

The MRT Front Splitter fits 2012 Boss 302 and 2010-2012 California Special Mustangs with no pieces being necessary for purchase. The 2010 - 2012 Mustang GT front fascia can be adapted to accommodate the MRT Front Splitter. The GT model requires the MRT GT Conversion Kit. Installation varies slightly depending on your Mustang's model. Boss 302 Mustangs benefit from a direct fit that requires no drilling. Simply snap in and go! The California Special lower grille insert does require holes to be drilled into it before installing the Splitter. MRT provides a template for locating the holes on the California Special lower grille insert. 2010 - 2012 GT Mustangs require the purchase of an Conversion Piece that adapts the GT front fascia to the shape of the MRT Front Splitter. This Conversion Piece is a direct replacement for your factory fascia.

At the beginning of the design process, we set out with a lofty goal: make the best possible Splitter for 2010-2012 Mustang on the after-market. We believe we've accomplished this. It's aggressive and aerodynamic. Coming from MRT's team of experienced engineers, you know it'll fit and it'll last. Like all MRT products, the Splitter is Made and Engineered in America. So enjoy, and please don't hesitate to contact our specialists with questions.

Products.ProductName: 1979 - 2019 Mustang MRT 5 Speed Shift Knob
Products.ProductDescription:
Review Pictures For Custom Shift Knob Options and Feature Codes

Add a sharp, custom look to your Ford Mustang with an MRT Shift Knob.This shift knob comes with a standard 16mm master thread and a reducer to fit your vehicle. The shift knobs come in two different sizes 2" or 2-1/4" knob diameters . The knobs will fit most vehicle applications with the proper reducer and hardware. MRT shift knobs are manufactured in America out of the finest Partek resin material. It ensures a lasting, high-gloss finish. A brass thread insert prevents frustrating stripped threads during installation. Our alignment jam-nut lets you set the shift knob to the height and position that you want. Best of all, these knobs are designed to resist changes in temperature: they won't freeze your hand in winter or fry it in the summer!

Engravings will be on both sides of the shift knob.

Embedments will be on the front of the shift knob (When installed facing the passengers).

Please Allow 2-4 Weeks For Each Custom Shift Ball To be Completed

If you do not see your shift pattern or shifter handle thread size available or have inquiries about custom colors embedments or engravings please contact MRT at (734)-455-5807

NOTE: PLEASE SELECT YOUR OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENUS BEFORE ADDING THIS PRODUCT TO YOUR CART. EACH SHIFT BALL IS CUSTOM MADE TO ORDER PER YOUR SELECTION , NO REFUNDS WILL BE PERMITTED FOR INCORRECT ORDERS.

Products.ProductName: 2010 - 2014 Mustang MRT Tow Hook and Mounting Bracket
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT understands when you are out on the open road or track it is best to be prepared for whatever the road throws at you. Therefore, if you find yourself stuck in mud, or off track, the MRT tow hook and mounting bracket will provide extra security for tow trucks to get you out of a jam. This attachment can help you save money and avoid cosmetic or mechanical damage by providing a better option for towing instead of suspension pieces or bumpers.

Aside from acting as a secure place to attach a winch or tow strap to get you unstuck, we think that tow hooks also add a nice aesthetic touch that will set your vehicle apart from the rest. Paint it to match your car or leave it contrasting to give a more aggressive look; it will turn heads either way. These mounting brackets are easy to install (included tow hook ) and we recommend never leaving home without a pair, especially before a big race.

Kit includes:
1/8 x 30" x 1 1/2 plate
1/8 x 24" x 4" Plate

Applicable to 2010 - 2014 Mustang all models

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80D000
Products.ProductDescription:
MRT Hood Struts for 1994-2004 Mustangs eliminate the need for the factory hood prop rod and give you a clean and functional "performance look." Our No-Drill Hood Struts give show Mustangs an impressive look that sets them apart from the crowd, without giving them a permanent handicap. Your Mustang deserves better than to have holes drilled into its hood. The MRT Hood Strut Kit reuses OEM factory attachment points. They are very easy to install -- all you'll need is a 10mm wrench. Unlike other available kits, MRT Hood Struts require absolutely NO DRILLING and no extra bolts during installation. Simply bolt the kit on and go! Team MRT engineered and manufactured the MRT Hood Strut Kits for 1994-2004 Mustangs in the United States. We designed these Hood Struts to work with the factory hood. If you have an aftermarket hood, our tech team may be able to assist you in the adjustment process or provide you with a higher or lower pressure gas strut.

Please contact us at (734) 455-5807 for more information. Struts in the kit are finished in black. Brackets are made out of high-quality steel for utmost durability. They come standard with a quality Black PowderCoat Finish. MRT can also paint your brackets in any paint color. Please provide a paint code when ordering. There is an $40 fee for this service and does require a 1-2 week lead time. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 if you have any questions about these custom finishes. MRT Hood Struts are rigorously engineered by Team MRT in Plymouth, MI. MRT Hood Struts are Made-in-America.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

Products.ProductName: MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91A203
Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91A203
Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91A203 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    • Fits 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, and 2010 Mustang GT 4.6L V8
    Fits 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, and 2010 Mustang GT California Special (GT/CS) 4.6L V8
    Fits 2008 and 2009 Mustang Bullitt 4.6L V8
    Fits 2007, 2008, 2009, and 2010 Mustang GT500 5.4L V8

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: MRT MaxFlow H-Pipe : No Cats #93B001
Products.ProductDescription:
Sport Touring Series : MRT MaxFlow H-Pipe : No Cats #93B001
Refined Sound with Just the right Attitude

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT MaxFlow H-Pipe : No Cats #93B001 has a refined, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 and 2004
    Mustang GT, Bullitt, Cobra and Mach 1 with 4.6L V8 and solid rear axle.
  • What doesn't it fit?
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang GT APR Rear Diffuser Fiber-Reinforced Plastic
Products.ProductDescription:
Add the finishing touch to your Mustang's exterior by dressing it up with a Fiberglass Rear Diffuser from APR Performance. This piece is exotic-looking, race-inspired, and unmatched in quality. In addition to offering a stylish racing look, the APR Mustang Rear Diffuser offers functionality that will boost your performance on track day.

This diffuser improves handling and grip by producing downforce with its aerodynamic design. In order to minimize turbulence and drag, the diffuser smoothly and efficiently directs high speed air flow from the lower pressure area underneath the car to the higher pressure region of the surrounding environment.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang GT APR Carbon Fiber Front Air Dam
Products.ProductDescription:
It is common to see new sports cars designed with items such as factory undertrays and other advanced aerodynamic components to produce "zero-lift". Although these components are great at reducing lift, they may not bring the added stability and traction road racers are looking for when taking fast turns.

This Carbon Fiber Front Air Dam goes beyond reducing lift and increases stability & downforce at high speeds. Aside from the performance benefits, the Front Air Dam also adds an aggressive yet functional appearance to a sports car. These carbon fiber front air dams are formed in the autoclave at high temperatures using pre-preg manufacturing processes.

Factory Fit Mounting Design; Front Air Dam utilizes existing factory mounting locations for an OEM fit.

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang APR Carbon Fiber Rear Diffuser
Products.ProductDescription:
Diffusers work in conjunction with other aerodynamic components of a car to help produce downforce. Because a car displaces air as it moves forward, the air molecules in the rear of the car get disrupted causing a vacuum of low pressure air.

To help channel the high speed air flow coming from underneath the car, diffusers redirects the high speed air flow to transition smoothly transition into the low pressure vacuum in the rear. This encourages a smoother flowing air flow underneath the car and allows better performance from other aerodynamic components such as aerodynamic wings.

Products.ProductName: 2007 - 2009 Mustang Shelby GT500 APR Widebody Aerodynamic Kit
Products.ProductDescription:
The GT-R Widebody aerodynamic Kit for the S197 Mustang gives an aggressive look while enhancing the smooth and subtle lines. This 10 piece kit helps to improve overall handling and traction. This aerodynamic kit increases the front stance by +45mm per front fender and +50mm per rear fender.

It allows installation of massive front wheel sizes of 20x9.5 with 285/30/20 profile tires and rear wheel sizes of 20x 12.5 with 345/25/20 profile tires. To enhance stability, the Mustang Widebody Aerodynamic Kit includes a carbon fiber front wind splitter that is designed as a front undertray. The optional 70 (1,778mm) GTC-500 Mustang Spec adjustable rear wing adds downforce on the rear wheels to increase rear-end stability.

This package includes:
- Widebody Front Bumper
- Carbon Fiber Wind Splitter/Undertray
- Widebody Front Fenders (45mm)
- Widebody Side Skirt
- Widebody Rear Fenders and Gas Door (50mm)
- Widebody Rear Bumper

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2009 Mustang APR Carbon Fiber Radiator Cooling Plate
Products.ProductDescription:
The flow of air is not only limited to the outside of a car. To maximize cooling capabilities, a radiator needs a direct flow of air to allow an engine to maintain consistent temperatures on the race track. Because of structural gaps above the radiator, the flow of air could escape making the radiator not as efficient as it could be.

To help improve the flow of air into the radiator, APR Carbon Fiber Radiator Cooling Plates can be utilized to channel the flow of air directly to the radiator. This will improve the efficiency of the radiator while adding a high-tech, race inspired look to your engine bay.

Pre-preg. Carbon Fiber Manufacturing Process Designed for Easy Installation Fade Resistant Epoxy Coating

Products.ProductFeatures:
NOTE: DOES NOT FIT 2011 - 2014 Ford F150 3.5L Eco-Boost (See part 73P006)
In minutes, dial in a custom boost setting for your Ford vehicle equipped 3.5L EcoBoost engine with the JMS boost control module. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated 5 PSI of extra boost.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a custom tune.

The JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer will work on 2011 -17 Ford models with 3.5L EcoBoost engines.

Each BoostMAX Kit Contains: BoostMAX Boost Enhancer, Plug & Play Wiring Harness, Remote Boost Control Knob, Installation Kit, Set of Instructions.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits 2011-2017 Ford and Lincoln vehicles.

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Ford vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitor, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated average increase in horsepower of 25 RWHP.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a JMS Custom Calibration.

The JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer will work on all Ford models with 1.6L or 2.0L EcoBoost engines. See Features section for complete list of vehicle applications.

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80A012
Products.ProductDescription:
The Original No-Drill MRT Hood Struts for 2005-2014 Ford Mustangs. These aftermarket Mustang hood struts eliminate the factory hood prop rod and give you the clean, pleasing appearance every engine compartment deserves. MRT Hood Struts are great for both show and street Mustangs - don't let that hood prop distract from all the power you've packed under the hood. MRT joined design teams to develop NO DRILL hood struts for your 2005-2014 Mustang. MRT's Mustang hood struts have since become one of MRT's bestselling products.

The consistent customer satisfaction we have observed in response to our hood struts confirms their quality design. MRT Hood struts reuse OEM factory attachment points (Direct bolt on) and require NO holes drilled anywhere. These hood struts are easy to install on your Mustang - the only tool required is a 10mm wrench. These are designed to function with the OE weighted hood. If you have an aftermarket hood, please call us at 734-455-5807 and we can discuss further options. Struts in the kit are finished in black. Brackets are made out of high-quality steel for utmost durability.

They come standard with a quality Black PowderCoat Finish. MRT can also paint your brackets in any paint color. Please allow a 1-2 week lead time for this special order product. There is an $40 fee for this service. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order a custom color not shown here.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

Products.ProductName: 2012 - 2015 Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly
Products.ProductDescription:
Sport Touring Series : Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly #90N181
Refined Sound with Just the right Attitude

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The Camaro V6 Ultra High Flow Catalytic Converter Assembly #90N181 adds a great sound with about 15% to 20% more sound than stock cats.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    200 cell highflow cat converters provide maximum exhaust gas flow. At 6.0L per side with a total of 12.0L of cleaning ability, these converters exceed performance specs.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    3/8 thick front flange tubing, O2 bungs, and welds are stainless steel.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    No Tips.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    No Tips.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    • Fits all 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015 Camaro LFX V6

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductFeatures:
Installing Your New Catalytic Converter

1. There are four (4) oxygen sensors (two per side) in your Camaro converters. Find and unplug each of the four (4) sensors. Unplugging these sensors can be a bit tricky. Some patience is required.

2. Unbolt the converter to manifold connection using a 15mm socket. You have to unbolt these from the engine compartment as the bolts are facing upwards.
Note: Make sure you undo the top bolts (CAT to MANIFOLD) first. If you undo the bottom first and then the top, the cat will fall and possibly break or damage the O2 sensors.

Note: This upward positioning of the bolts will be repeated when installing the SOLO cats. This is necessary to have access to the O2 sensor directly beneath these bolts.

3. Undo the bottom bolts using a 15mm socket. Carefully remove the converter.

4. Carefully remove the oxygen sensors from the stock converter with a 22ml or 7/8 wrench or special O2 socket.

5. Take great care not to mix up the O2 positions. They have to be put back in the same position from where they were taken.

6. Install the new SOLO Cats. The cats are market with a R (Passenger side) and L (Drivers side).

7. Sequence at Cat to Manifold connection from underneath the car:
Bolt facing upwards
Flat washer
Car
Solo gasket *Provided (Please be careful with the edges as they can be sharp.)
Manifold
Flat washer
Lock washer
Nut

8. Use the stock GM band clamps at the rear converter connection.

9. Finger tighten all bolts and manipulate the cat into alignment.

10. At this time the SOLO CATS should be sitting in place with the O2 sensors still removed.

11. Snug and then tighten all 8 bolts. Do this in an even manner. The front bolts can be either tightened from the bottom or top with a 9/16 socket.

12. Screw the front oxygen sensors into the O2 bungs on the SOLO FREE-FLOW CATS until very snug.

13. Screw the two (2) O2 extenders into the rear O2 ports of your converter until very snug. Screw the two (2) rear O2 sensors into the extenders until snug.

14. Plug in all four (4) O2 sensors into the wiring harness.

15. Check all connections and O2s to ensure they are tight and plugged in.

16. Check for rattles and tip alignment.

17. Drive away and Enjoy Going Solo!

9. Finger tighten all bolts and manipulate the cat into alignment.

10. At this time the SOLO CATS should be sitting in place with the O2 sensors still removed.

11. Snug and then tighten all 8 bolts. Do this in an even manner. The front bolts can be either tightened from the bottom or top with a 9/16 socket.

12. Screw the front oxygen sensors into the O2 bungs on the SOLO FREE-FLOW CATS until very snug.

13. Screw the two (2) O2 extenders into the rear O2 ports of your converter until very snug. Screw the two (2) rear O2 sensors into the extenders until snug.

14. Plug in all four (4) O2 sensors into the wiring harness.

15. Check all connections and O2s to ensure they are tight and plugged in.

16. Check for rattles and tip alignment.

17. Drive away and Enjoy Going Solo!

Products.ProductName: 1979 - 2019 Mustang MRT Special Edition Bullitt Shift Knob
Products.ProductDescription:
Finish off the tough, clean performance look of your Bullitt Mustang with a sharp, custom shift knob from MRT. The Bullitt Shift Knob a "riveted" satin trim and embedment featuring "Bullitt" and your very own Bullitt vehicle number. This shift knob comes with a standard 12mm thread and 2-1/4" knob diameter. Available in Highland Green or Solid Black colors. The knob will fit 2001 and 2008-09 Bullitt Mustangs without modifications. MRT shift knobs are manufactured in America out of the finest Partek resin material. It ensures a lasting, high-gloss finish. A brass thread insert prevents frustrating stripped threads during installation. Our alignment jam-nut lets you set the shift knob to the height and position that you want. Best of all, these knobs are designed to resist changes in temperature: they won't freeze your hand in winter or fry it in the summer! Please be sure to indicate your vehicle year and Bullitt vehicle number when ordering. This is a special ordered product, therefore it may take 4-6 weeks for delivery. Ford Mustang Fits 2001 and 2008-2009 Bullitt Mustangs Bullitt design w/your vehicle's number embedded Available in Highland Green or Solid Black Standard 12mm thread 2-1/4" knob diameter Resin material with lasting glossy finish Brass thread insert included Alignment jam nut included Made in America 4-6 weeks for delivery.

PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR BULLITT NUMBER IN THE ORDER NOTES.

NOTE: PLEASE SELECT YOUR OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENUS BEFORE ADDING THIS PRODUCT TO YOUR CART. EACH SHIFT BALL IS CUSTOM MADE TO ORDER PER YOUR SELECTION , NO REFUNDS WILL BE PERMITTED FOR INCORRECT ORDERS.

Products.ProductName: 2008 - 2014 Dodge Challenger Roto-Fab Hemi Air Intake System
Products.ProductDescription: Increase HP & torque without sacrificing Fuel economy with the Roto-Fab Cold Air Intake system . This system is designed to maintain a barrier between the filter and harmful engine and radiator heat. The bottom of the air box is formed and cut for coupling to the stock air inlet hole. We have a triangular inlet on the outboard side of the air box that draws cooler air from the same area as the bottom opening; resulting in a larger volume of cooler air when you need it. Black anodized aluminum brackets mount to existing locations on your vehicle. No modifications are required for installation. Our custom molded air box coupler attaches to the air box with 6 stainless steel 10-32 screws. From start to finish, Roto-fab has designed and built this air intake with all of the qualities to make it work!
Products.ProductDescriptionShort:
• Dodge Challenger 5.7L Hemi 2008+
  • Blocks Engine Heat from Filter
  • No Calibration Required
  • Easy, Bolt-On Installation

Products.ProductName: 2005 - 2010 Dodge Challenger 5.7L Cold Air Kit by Cold Air Inductions
Products.ProductDescription:
Maximize the performance of your Dodge Challenger with this high-performance cold air intake system from Cold Air Inductions, Inc. This CAI system delivers superior quality and craftsmanship, while achieving outstanding performance gains. CAI, Inc. estimates an average increase of 16 rear wheel horsepower, 14 ft-lb of torque, and up to 4 MPG in fuel economy on an otherwise stock V8 Challenger. This premium cold air induction kit is a direct replacement for the OEM air box. There's no need for additional modifications to your Challenger during installation. An aftermarket tune is NOT required to reap the performance benefits of this air intake. CAI, Inc. makes this premium cold air intake in the USA.

System fits 2005-2010 Dodge Challengers with 5.7L and 6.1L V8 engines. Available in Standard and Black PowderCoat Finishes.

Enhance your 2012-2015 Camaro ZL1's performance by upgrading to a high-performance Roto-Fab Cold Air Induction system. The Roto-Fab Camaro Cold Air Intake a new air box design, MAF housing and inlet elbow unique to the ZL1. - Plastic tube
- Silicone hoses
- Air box
- Oiled air filter

Products.ProductFeatures:
Enhance your 2010-2015 V6 Camaros performance by upgrading to a high-performance Roto-Fab Cold Air Induction system. The Roto-Fab Camaro Cold Air Intake incorporates an air box custom-made to keep engine and radiator heat away from your filter. The molded air box adapter tube incorporates the mass air flow (MAF) sensor. Installation of this Roto-Fab CAI kit is easy, using factory mounting points. No tuning is required for installation. Oil filters come pre-oiled and ready to use. The filter requires 56 grams of oil when serviced. Roto-Fab makes their Cold Air Intake for 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro in the USA.

Cold Air Intake Kit includes:
- Plastic tube
- Silicone hoses
- Air box
- Oiled air filter
- All necessary hardware

Products.ProductName: Ford Vehicles with MAF SCT BIG AIR Mass Air Flow Meter
Products.ProductDescription:
The SCT Big Air Mass Airflow Slot Style Sensor is great for modified and custom tuned applications where the stock mass air meter "pegs" due to increased air flow. SCT's Big Air MAF Meter features OEM quality calibration for factory level drivability, repeated accuracy, and reliability. This MAF sensor supports centrifugal superchargers that range in the 425-600 HP range and Root Style Superchargers from 400-700 HP.

The SCT Big Air Mass Airflow Slot Style Sensor will provide increased performance on the 2000-2004 Ford Lightning and the 2003-2004 SVT Cobra. *Also may be installed on any Ford vehicle requiring a larger MAF.

* some fabrication may be required.

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2015 Chevy SS Roto-Fab Cold Air Intake w/ Black Texture Finish
Products.ProductDescription: Many vendors have found sealing an induction system from engine bay heat to be quite difficult on the new Chevy SS. Not Roto-fab, they've taken the time to ensure you get the most out of your CAI by sealing off the top of the induction box, forcing true cold air in from behind the bumper. With gains upwards of 11rwhp, and plenty of added throttle response, you won't be disappointed with this upgrade. The install can be completed in under an hour with simple hand tools, and doesn't require a new PCM calibration, so you can get right back on the road. Roto-fab Cold Air Induction systems come with a pre-oiled, washable, conical air filter for maximum performance. This induction comes with a black texture finish, but is also available in Carbon Fiber for that classy performance look under your hood.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits most 2008-2015 General Motors vehicles, including the 2010-2015 Chevrolet Camaro. (See Features section for complete list of applications.)

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Camaro or General Motors vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration. The optional dial allows you to adjust your throttle response from stock (0%) to all out race mode (100%) in a matter of seconds.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitors, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80U900
Products.ProductDescription:
Don't let your factory prop rod distract from all that power you've packed under the hood. Give your engine bay a clean, custom look with MRT Hood Struts for the 2015-2017 Ford Mustang, featuring the Original, "No Drill" design.
Unlike other Hood Strut Kits in the aftermarket, the MRT Kit requires NO DRILLING for installation, meaning no holes drilled ANYWHERE. MRT Hood Struts easily install in 15 minutes or less from start to finish. The only tools required are a ratchet with 10 mm and 13 mm sockets. Because MRT designed this kit for the 2015-17 Mustang, there are no extra modifications to the vehicle. Components simply bolt on at OEM factory mounting locations.

Gas Cylinders in all MRT kits feature a black powder-coat finish. Several finish options are available for the Hood Strut Brackets. The standard bracket finish is a satin black powder-coat. To give your Mustang a personalized touch, upgrade to one of our many custom paint options. Select your custom paint option above or contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order. Please allow a 1-2 week lead time for custom painted brackets.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

NOTE: 2015-2016 ROUSH EDITION Mustangs will require an upgraded strut. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 prior to placing your order.
